name: Kawasaki Superbike Challenge
overview: Get ready for the biggest adrenaline rush of your life - Kawasaki Superbike Challenge! A proven driving engine has been enhanced and improved to provide superior graphics, sound, speed and handling. Choose from 15 circuits, including the Suzuka 8 hour endurance race with night riding and changeovers. Experience realistic motorcycle racing with weather changes which affect performance, tire wear and pit stops. Kawasaki Superbike Challenge is motorcycle racing at its fastest!
